definition: utility to warm a building, make hot or hotter
details:
noun
- utility to warm a building
= example: utility to warm a building
= synonyms: heating system
- the trait of being intensely emotional
= synonyms: warmth, passion
- the presence of heat
= synonyms: hotness, high temperature
- the sensation caused by heat energy
= synonyms: warmth
- a preliminary race in which the winner advances to a more important race
- a form of energy that is transferred by a difference in temperature
= synonyms: heat energy
- applies to nonhuman mammals: a state or period of heightened sexual arousal and activity
= synonyms: rut
verb
- make hot or hotter
= example: make hot or hotter
= synonyms: heat up
- gain heat or get hot
= example: gain heat or get hot
= synonyms: hot up, heat up
- arouse or excite feelings and passions
= synonyms: wake
- provide with heat
= example: provide with heat
